vertical_process.description: Sequential steps flow vertically with numbered progression

structure.hero: Full-width title + subtitle with gradient background
structure.elements: Stacked cards with progressive numbering, connecting lines

css_hints.connectors: Use ::after pseudo-elements for arrows/lines between steps
css_hints.numbering: Large circular badges with step numbers

structure.elements: CSS Grid or Flexbox columns, equal height

css_hints.equal_height: Use flexbox or grid to ensure columns same height
css_hints.visual_metaphor: Icon at top like capital of column

stacked_layers.description: Layers stacked vertically showing hierarchy or building blocks
stacked_layers.best_for: 4-7 layers, maturity levels, building from foundation

structure.elements: Cards with increasing/decreasing width to show pyramid/hierarchy

css_hints.visual_hierarchy: Larger/bolder at base, lighter at top
css_hints.connectors: No explicit connectors, use spacing and alignment

timeline.description: Horizontal or vertical timeline with chronological progression

structure.elements: Timeline rail with nodes for each stage

css_hints.timeline_rail: Vertical or horizontal line with position: relative
css_hints.nodes: Circular badges positioned on rail with ::before
css_hints.alternating: Consider alternating left/right for vertical timeline

cycle.best_for: 4-8 stages in feedback loop, iterative process

structure.elements: Circular arrangement (CSS Grid with polar coordinates or SVG)

css_hints.circular_layout: Use transform: rotate() and translate() or CSS Grid
css_hints.arrows: Curved arrows between elements (SVG or CSS border tricks)
css_hints.central_hub: Optional central element showing loop purpose

dashboard.description: Grid layout with multiple elements visible at once

structure.elements: CSS Grid with 2-3 columns, compact cards

css_hints.compact_cards: Smaller padding, less white space than other layouts

usage_notes.responsive: All layouts must be mobile-responsive (single column on small screens)
usage_notes.accessibility: Maintain semantic HTML hierarchy regardless of visual layout
usage_notes.creativity: Use these as starting points, add custom visual elements per metaphor
